name: Hitman 2016 UI Conversion
description: (Some options may need to be selected again after updates) A combination of Heritage UI, Hitman 2016 Menu and Music Replacement, Hitman 2016 Intro, and my own edits, aiming to make the UI look as close to Hitman 2016 as possible.

options.name: On (2016 Casual)
options.tooltip: Heritage UI's custom destination menu, with H2016's destination tiles. (I couldn't figure out how to make the difficulty level actually display your last played difficulty, so it always displays the one you set here.)

options.name: On (2016 Professional)
options.tooltip: Heritage UI's custom destination menu, with H2016's destination tiles. (I couldn't figure out how to make the difficulty level actually display your last played difficulty, so it always displays the one you set here.)

options.name: On (2016 Master)
options.tooltip: Heritage UI's custom destination menu, with H2016's destination tiles. (I couldn't figure out how to make the difficulty level actually display your last played difficulty, so it always displays the one you set here.)

options.name: Off
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA's default destination tile images. (These options don't affect the destinations menu if you have the "Off" option selected in the "Destination Tiles" category.)

options.name: On (H2016 GOTY Images)
options.tooltip: Replace the thumbnails of the Season 1 destination tiles with the ones from H2016 GOTY. (These options don't affect the destinations menu if you have the "Off" option selected in the "Destination Tiles" category.)

options.name: On (Original 2016 Images)
options.tooltip: Replace the thumbnails of the Season 1 destination tiles with the ones from the original H2016. (These options don't affect the destinations menu if you have the "Off" option selected in the "Destination Tiles" category.)

options.name: On (2016 Hybrid Images)
options.tooltip: S1 destination tile thumbnails from H2016 GOTY, but with the old ICA facility one and a centered Paris one. (These options don't affect the destinations menu if you have the "Off" option selected in the "Destination Tiles" category.)

english.2037552605: Talking to certain NPCs might reveal Opportunities.
english.3938743496: Opportunity Guides can be configured from the Gameplay Options menu or turned off completely.
english.67212165: Once a Opportunity has been revealed, you do not need to reveal it again.

english.3232074948: Would you like to follow this Opportunity?
english.3778156200: View more information about this Opportunity.

english.2470456272: You can enable Opportunities in the Options Menu.
english.1558162771:
• Saves are unlimited. Autosaves are available.
  • All Opportunities are available.
  • Getting spotted by cameras will only affect your rating and score.
  • Combat is challenging and should be avoided.
english.3124886732:
• You may only save once per mission. Autosaves are disabled.
  • All Opportunities are turned off.
  • Getting spotted by cameras will affect your rating and score. Guards will also react to illegal actions recorded by cameras.
  • NPCs are more perceptive, and combat is very dangerous.
  • Ruined disguises cannot be taken from anyone eliminated in a bloody manner.
  • Many items are considered suspicious when equipped.
  • Missions have been altered for a greater challenge.
english.3589489595: Opportunities are not available on Professional Difficulty Level.
english.261575956:
Full: All Guide hints are visible. In game tracker icons appear for a tracked Opportunity. Objectives are shown in the HUD.

Minimal: In game tracker icons are hidden. Guide hints can still be accessed, and Guide objectives are still tracked in the HUD.

Off: All Guide communication is turned off.

english.1534599692: This Opportunity is no longer available

• Complete all Opportunities in the mission.

english.3293966868: Opportunity - First Day On The Job

english.2876520664:
• Complete all Opportunities in the mission.
  • Complete 5 assassination challenges in the mission.
english.995990895: Opportunity - No Absolution For The Wicked

english.575984361: Opportunity - A Drink to Die For

english.3395321272:
• Complete all Opportunities in the mission.
  • Complete five assassination challenges in the mission.

english.4040481522: • Complete all 3 Opportunity Challenges in the ICA Facility.

english.3880827585:
• One save per mission
  • Opportunity guides available
  • Extra surveillance cameras
  • Extra enforcers
  • Ruthless and demanding combat
  • Bloody eliminations ruin disguises
  • NPCs are more attentive to sounds
english.2528508651:
• Unlimited saves
  • All Opportunity guides available
  • Surveillance cameras active
  • Cameras alert guards if illegal activity is spotted
  • Combat is challenging but fair
english.3098582394:
• Unlimited saves
  • All Opportunity guides available
  • No surveillance cameras
  • Less enforcers
  • Forgiving combat
  • More items are legal to carry
  • NPCs are less attentive to sounds

english.2373516590: Complete the Opportunity 'Her Final Resting Place.'

english.2337147321:
Completing a mission is just the beginning. They are meant to be played more than once.

There are multiple plots to uncover, characters to get to know and unlocks to earn.

To get the overall story of {0} we recommend that you complete the following Opportunities.
english.1948079601:
The missions in HITMAN can be solved in countless ways. One approach is to uncover some of the many Opportunities and follow them through.
Since this is your first time in Miami, you may choose to have a guide active from the get go.
english.2669585447:
You experiment and have fun. Toy with targets, blow things up and take chances. This is about making a general mess, running and hiding to see what happens. And then doing it all over again.
  • Unlimited saves
  • Opportunities guides available
  • No surveillance cameras
  • Less enforcers
  • Forgiving combat
  • More items are legal to carry
  • NPCs are less attentive to sounds
english.3950567915:
Assassination is serious business. You plan, you execute, you escape. And your handler is right there, giving you the guidance you need to succeed.
  • Unlimited saves
  • All Opportunities available
  • Surveillance cameras active
  • Cameras alert guards if illegal activity is spotted
  • Combat is challenging but fair
english.741467068:
You are the ultimate assassin. No challenge is too hard and you exist only to take out your targets in the most complicated ways possible with no assistance from anyone.
  • One save per mission
  • No Opportunities available
  • Extra surveillance cameras
  • Extra enforcers
  • Ruthless and demanding combat
  • Bloody eliminations ruin disguises
  • NPCs are more attentive to sounds
english.1832514662: Opportunities are not available on Master Difficulty Level.

english.1254646859: • Complete all 3 Opportunity Challenges in Santa Fortuna.

english.189850128: Opportunity - A Dress To Die For

english.4009914202: • Complete all 3 Opportunity Challenges in Whittleton Creek.

english.1026217010: • Complete all 3 Opportunity Challenges on The Isle of Sgàil.
english.2901241233: Opportunity - A Phoenix From The Ashes
english.4083809356: Opportunity - It Belongs In A Museum

english.3861557888: • Complete all 3 Opportunity Challenges on Haven Island.

english.874176276: • Complete all 3 Opportunity Challenges in the Milton-Fitzpatrick bank.

english.252275248: This information could lead to interesting ways of luring your target out. These are called Opportunities. You can choose to be guided through Opportunities, or piece the puzzle together by yourself.
english.2516597642: Press {NOTEBOOK} at any time to learn more about Opportunities.
english.1907889805: Opportunities will complete before the final blow. The trap is set. Now fetch Jasper Knight and guide him through the procedure.

english.3096700152: Opportunities can guide you through the world with waypoints (currently active), or they can give minimal hints for what to do. You can also turn them off entirely.
english.401964745: This Opportunity unlocks on mission complete

english.975818405: A Opportunity has been revealed. To track it click {NOTEBOOK}
english.1382600923: A Opportunity has been revealed. To track it press {NOTEBOOK}

english.275673424:
Two Opportunities have been unlocked for you, to guide you through creating your first contracts. You must complete at least one of the Opportunities to complete the tutorial.

Open your log now and track one of them by pressing {ACCEPT}.
english.2102706357:
You successfully completed both Opportunities!
Exit the mission to edit your contract.
english.298463466: Both Opportunities are missed. Restart to try again.
english.1961689847:
The remote explosive is gone.
Restart mission to retry the Playful Assassin Opportunity.
english.2527253956:
All propane flasks are gone.
Restart mission to retry the Playful Assassin Opportunity.
english.3959321027:
You were spotted doing something suspicious or illegal.
Restart mission to retry the Skilled Assassin Opportunity.
english.1657985396:
You pacified and dumped the guard in a container. Now he cannot be eliminated or marked.
Restart the mission to retry the Skilled Assassin Opportunity.
english.538605074:
You seized the Skilled Assassin Opportunity, and Playful Assassin is still available.
Restart to play from the beginning, or open your log to track the Playful Assassin Opportunity.
english.501439889:
You seized the Playful Assassin Opportunity, and Skilled Assassin is still available.
Restart to play from the beginning, or open your log to track the Skilled Assassin Opportunity.
english.3161574260:
You seized the Skilled Assassin Opportunity, but Playful Assassin is missed.
Restart the mission to complete the Playful Assassin Opportunity, or get to an exit to edit your contract.
english.3733198544:
You seized the Playful Assassin Opportunity, but Skilled Assassin is missed.
Restart the mission to complete the Skilled Assassin Opportunity, or get to an exit to edit your contract.

english.1252895656: The remote explosive is gone. Restart the mission to retry this Opportunity.
english.4230722489: All propane flasks are gone. Restart the mission to retry this Opportunity.

english.4019272188: You got spotted doing something suspicious or illegal! Restart the mission to retry this Opportunity.
english.226303374: You pacified and then dumped the guard in a container. Now he cannot be eliminated or marked. Restart the mission to retry this Opportunity.

english.2740787651: A Opportunity is no longer available, due to an in-world change in conditions. Guide information will no longer be valid.

options.name: Off
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA's default "PRESS [Enter] TO PLAY" text.
options.group: Misc. Localization Changes (Press [Enter] to Play Fix)

options.name: On
options.tooltip: Properly capitalizes the "Press [Enter] to Play" text on the title screen.
options.group: Misc. Localization Changes (Press [Enter] to Play Fix)

options.name: Off
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA's default campaign tab title.

options.name: On (GOTY)
options.tooltip: Makes the campaign tab say "Campaign" like it did in H2016 GOTY.

options.name: On (Old 2016)
options.tooltip: Makes the campaign tab say "Story" like it did in the original H2016.

options.name: Off
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA's default exit text.

options.name: On (GOTY)
options.tooltip: Properly capitalizes the exit text, like it was in H2016 GOTY.

options.name: On (Old 2016)
options.tooltip: Changes the exit text to "Locate Exit", which is what it was in the original H2016.

options.name: Default (One Line)
options.tooltip: HUI's default unconscious witness banner, with all the text on one line.

options.name: GOTY (Two Lines)
options.tooltip: H2016 GOTY's unconscious witness banner, with both words on their own lines.

options.name: Old 2016 (Compromised)
options.tooltip: Makes the unconscious witness banner say "Compromised", like it did in the original H2016.

options.name: On
options.tooltip: Adds quick save/load buttons to the pause menu.

options.name: Off
options.tooltip: Hitman WOA's default item/suit sorting.

options.name: On (Peacock Only)
options.tooltip: Heritage UI's more organized item/suit sorting.

options.name: On (Peacock Only, HUI Sorting MUST be enabled)
options.tooltip: Adds a custom subcategory for favorite items. Tutorial for adding and removing items can be found on Heritage UI's Nexus page.

options.name: On (Peacock Only, HUI Sorting MUST be enabled)
options.tooltip: Allows you to hide disliked items in a custom 'vault' category. Tutorial for adding and removing items can be found on Heritage UI's Nexus page.
